title: 如何做一个地图(手持的那种)
author: lonelymc
txt_content:
如何做一个地图(手持的那种)
咋获取 MapCanvas 实例

replies.txt_content: 如果说是左手拿着的小地图的话，那应该是高版本的双持，在物品栏人的右下有一个格子

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadoc ... /map/MapCanvas.html
javadocs可以为你提供帮助

replies.author: William_Shi
replies.txt_content:
直接用元数据我想
有自带的方法
xxx.getColor()
xxx.setColor()
xxx.setScaling()复制代码
等等

replies.author: lonelymc
replies.txt_content:
William_Shi 发表于 2019-4-6 17:08
https://hub.spigotmc.org/javadocs/bukkit/org/bukkit/map/MapCanvas.html
javadocs可以为你提供帮助 ...
doc翻阅了很久没有翻到。。。
